answerText: The Western Canon[10] Among Bloom's upcoming works may be a play about this poet who wrote that "I do not know whether others behold what I behold" in his poem "A Broadway Pageant." Many of his poems appeared in Leaves of Grass.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Michigan B and Yale A | 5 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This text claimed that the School of Resentment sought to enlarge the title collection of works at the expense of the validity of that unit. For 10 points each: [10] Name this work of literary criticism by Harold Bloom that outlined 26 authors that were core to literary tradition.
